welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded successfully. You might need to refresh the page to see all changes.
login.descDefault: Log in to your Kratia Forums account.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: Please verify your email address {{email}} before logging in. Check your inbox (and spam folder) for the verification link.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after successful authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue accessing your user profile: {{reason}}.
login.error.googleAuthFailed: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Logged in with Google, but there was an issue accessing your profile: {{reason}}.
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again later.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
signup.title: Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Create your account and apply for admission to our community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself and why you'd like to join Kratia Forums (min. 50 characters). This will be part of your admission request.
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Your presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Presentation (min 50 chars) is required before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Rules and Conditions.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: You must agree to the Rules and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is sanctioned and cannot create new accounts with this provider.
signup.error.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during Google Sign-Up: {{reason}}.
signup.error.googleCancelled: Google Sign-Up was cancelled by the user.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this Google account's email but may be linked to a different sign-in method (e.g., email/password). Please log in using that method.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: A verification email has been sent to your address. Please check your inbox.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please write a brief presentation (min 50 chars) before signing up.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the Rules and Conditions.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: No worries! Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: If an account exists for {{email}}, you will receive a password reset link shortly. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email within a few minutes, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent. Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation
confirmPage.default.description: Please check your email or follow previous instructions.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.

profileEdit.notificationPrefs.title: Notification Preferences
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.descriptio: Choose how you want to be notified about activity on Kratia Forums.

profileEdit.notificationPrefs.votationCo: Receive a web notification when a votation you proposed finishes.

proposeConstitution.error.loadFail: Failed to load current constitution text. Please try again later.

proposeConstitution.toast.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to propose changes.
proposeConstitution.toast.noChanges.desc: The proposed constitution text is identical to the current one. No proposal created.
proposeConstitution.votationDescription: Proposal to change the site constitution. Justification: {{justification}}...

proposeConstitution.toast.error.descript: Failed to propose constitution change. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.form.proposalTitlePl: e.g., Update Article 3 regarding Karma System
proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain clearly why these changes are proposed and their benefits.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the entire current constitution here and make your modifications. Highlight or explain changes in your justification.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Ensure this text represents the complete, final version of the constitution you are proposing.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. Ensure your proposed text is final and your justification is clear.

proposeSanction.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to sanction a user. This will create a public votation in the Agora.

The user you are trying to propose a sanction for could not be found.
proposeSanction.error.loadTargetUserFail: Failed to load target user data.
proposeSanction.accessDenied.generic: You do not have permission to propose sanctions. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.
proposeSanction.accessDenied.underSancti: You cannot propose sanctions while under a sanction process yourself.

proposeSanction.accessDenied.title: Access Denied

proposeSanction.toast.userNotFoundOnSubm: User data not found. Cannot submit proposal.
proposeSanction.initialPostContent:
A proposal has been made to sanction user **{{username}}** for a duration of **{{duration}}**.

**Justification by Proposer:**
{{justification}}

This matter is now subject to community votation in the Agora. The target user may reply in this thread to present their defense.
proposeSanction.toast.successDesc: The sanction proposal against {{username}} has been created in the Agora.
proposeSanction.toast.errorDesc: Failed to propose sanction. Please try again.
proposeSanction.form.justificationPlaceh: Clearly explain the reasons for proposing this sanction, citing specific rule violations or behaviors if applicable.
proposeSanction.importantNotice.title: Important Notice
proposeSanction.importantNotice.descript: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. User {{username}} will be notified and will be able to defend themselves in the votation thread.
